Name: MetaMorphic Rippers
About the game: Important: a phone is not required to play this game. Developed by SlovGoblin, MetaMorphic Rippers is a fast-paced arena brawler that combines the stylish combat of a hack-and-slash game with transformations. Players can select classes with unique attributes and abilities to master. Key Features Fast-paced arena combat Skill-based competition and intense battles Incredible, diverse RipperSuits 4 unique classes each equipped with unique attributes and abilities to fit your play style. Pick-ups are scattered across the map to help you in the heat of battle.
